LanguageData.DMBurn.label: dark burn
LanguageData.DMBurn.description: a burn where flesh was disintegrated.
LanguageData.NakiRaceDarkMatterNeed.label: Dark Matter need
LanguageData.NakiRaceDarkMatterNeed.description: Naki need to ingest Dark Matter to prevent bodily degredation and to power their psycasts.
